pageContext.claim:
“The purchase of many F-35 aircraft by Poland -- the finest jet in the world, they say.
The finest fighter plane anywhere in the world.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a flip-flop by Trump. When he was running for president in 2015, he said of the F-35: "“I do hear that it’s not very good. I'm hearing that our existing planes are better....They're saying it doesn't perform as well as our existing equipment, which is much less expensive. So when I hear that, immediately I say we have to do something, because you know, they're spending billions. This is a plane. There’s never been anything like it in terms of cost.”
